name: National
description: Intended for users of a country, e.g. national data reppsitory

name: Regional
description: Intended for users of a region (e.g. Europe)

name: Institution
description: Intended for users of an institution, e.g. university publication repository

name: Research Infrastructure
description: Intended for users of ESFRI Communities

name: e-Infrastructure
description: Intended for users of horizontal e-infra services (e.g. EGI, GEANT, OpenAIRE, EUDAT, Fenix)
